text: Like you I wanted my own business and through uni I created a design business which paid for all my uni fees, it’s time consuming but extremely rewarding! If you are a good communicator and confident then sales and marketing would be great. We present on a regular basis to up to 60 people at a time. What kind of experience are you looking to get?

Well I'm currently in the process of getting two work experience placements for February/ March. One is at the Hilton hotel near where I live and the second is also near where I live and it is a company called PRS Distribution. And as a side job I am doing a paper round every two weeks to get a bit of money in. I've been doing it for at least 5 years now.
That’s good, it’s best to get the experience, gives you an idea of what you want to go into.  Are you planning on going to university?
That’s good, it’s best to get the experience, gives you an idea of what you want to go into.  Are you planning on going to university?
